attributes.action: We fully support the Prorogue of Parliament in order to secure Brexit on Oct 31
attributes.additional_details:
Between December 2018 and March 2019 Parliament had numerous votes on how Brexit should go and yet after 30 proposals our MPs were unable to come out with a viable option.

Both Labour and Conservative manifestos stated they would support the 2016 referendum result in their General Election manifestos in 2017, continually blocking the process is not adhering to these promises
attributes.background:
With the news that our PM would approach the Queen to Prorogue Parliament in order to secure a no deal Brexit on Oct 31 there is a petition against this action.

This petition will show that there is actual support for the proposal and this is the only way to break the uncertainty around Brexit
